summary: This bill, the Strengthening Agency Management and Oversight of Software Assets Act, mandates improved visibility, accountability, and oversight of federal agencies' software asset management practices. It requires agencies to conduct comprehensive assessments of their software, develop plans for consolidation and cost reduction, and report findings to relevant government bodies. The bill also directs the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to promote standardization and issue recommendations on software procurement. The bill aims to improve interoperability, reduce costs, and modernize software management across government.
